snippet: Creditors wrapped up a review of the country’s progress in meeting the terms of its second bailout and said they would return in September for a final assessment.
abstract: Envoys of Greece’s international creditors wrap up review of the country’s progress in meeting the terms of its second bailout; say they will return in September for a final assessment that will determine whether further money will be released and a potentially disastrous default averted.
lead_paragraph: Creditors wrapped up a review of the country’s progress in meeting the terms of its second bailout and said they would return in September for a final assessment.

headline.seo: Greece Says Progress Made in Talks With Troika
headline.main: Optimism in Greece After Talks With Lenders
headline.print_headline: Optimism In Greece After Talks With Lenders
